title: Sr. Front End Developer
job_desc:
• Working closely with BE engineers to develop both in-house and clients' web applications or websites.
  • Providing guidance and troubleshooting for our team on FE related issues.
  • Maintaining and updating internal platforms to meet the business needs.
  • Code reviewing & testing staff's work

title: Front End Developer
job_desc:
• Bringing our clients' website designs to life using HTML, CSS & JavaScript and its frameworks.
  • Monitoring clients' websites to ensure they are working as expected during campaign.
  • Recommending solutions for a streamlined, responsive interface with the design team.
  • Communicating technical issues in an understandable manner to our internal team

title: Web Designer & Developer
job_desc:
• Creating and maintaining CMS-based company profile & product websites.
  • Designing prototype and user interface for our client's mobile apps.
  • Designing catalogs, banners, logos, and other printed materials for promotions and advertisements
